list.title: Albertours
list.description: Web platform developed in PHP for managing tour reservations across various Spanish cities. It allows users to explore available tours, make or cancel reservations, and view detailed information about each tour.

list.title: Roma8
list.description: Web and mobile application developed with Quasar for managing and administering a residential estate. This project was carried out in collaboration with a teammate.

list.title: Memory Game Application
list.description: Java application of the classic memory game using MongoDB as the database. It allows users to register, log in, and play at different difficulty levels. It records times, results, and high scores, following the MVC design pattern.

list.title: Hotel Estrellas
list.description: Application for managing hotel room bookings, offering a complete customer experience. Includes a mobile version with information on services like dining, pool, and gym, allowing users to search, explore, and book rooms quickly and securely. Developed as a team project.

list.title: Food App
list.description: Web interface for managing food dishes. It fetches data using a public REST API and stores relevant information in a local database. Also includes technologies for search and management functionalities.

list.title: Templator
list.description: An HTML WYSIWYG editor based on Summernote that enables any user to easily create and manage email templates without needing technical knowledge.

list.title: Software Fitness
list.description: Development of a web platform for efficient club management and enhanced user experience.
